history.proof: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3 H4. srun best use: existE unfold: Formula, System, SysPrf, impH, existH.

original: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3 H4. apply impE with (f := impH f g). - apply impI with (f := g). apply Axm. auto. - apply impE with (f := f). + apply sysWeaken with (g := impH (existH v f) g). * apply existI. auto. * apply impE with (f := existH v f). -- apply forallSimp. apply iffE2 with (f := impH (existH v f) g). apply existSys; auto. -- apply existE with (f := g). apply freeVarFormula. auto. apply H4. + apply cp2. apply iffE1 with (f := existH v f). apply iffSym. apply existI. apply orE with (f := impH (existH v f) g). * apply freeVarFormula. auto. * apply iffE2 with (f := impH (existH v f) g). apply existSys; auto. * apply Axm. apply freeVarFormula. auto.
